EmailTemplate.name: 3-Day VHM Drip.Emma Followup #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VHM download
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Just following-up on my email from yesterday. Do you have 5 minutes to hop on a quick call today? I want to make sure you received your Virtual Health Monitor license key and were able to deploy the appliance. Thank you!
Kind regards,
Jillian Grassetti EvalTeam Help Associate, VMTurbo, Inc. o 866.834.5087 | e evalTeam@vmturbo.com <mailto:evalTeam@vmturbo.com>
